alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:59PM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches at lower elevations, with up to 10 inches on higher peaks and passes. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel may be challenging over the higher terrain and secondary roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will drop back below freezing this evening, with spotty ice likely on roadways, especially those with any moisture still on the pavement.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
